sourcesContent:
import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'
import FilterForm from '../components/FilterForm'
import ResponsePagination from '../components/ResponsePagination'
import { useGlobalContext } from '../context'


const HomeScreen = () => {
    const { type,
        setType,
        queryPage,
        queryBeerName,
        queryMinABV,
        queryMaxABV,
        isLoading,
        data,
        isError,
        count,
        searchBeer,
    } = useGlobalContext();
    return (
        <>
            <Container className='home-filterForm py-3 px-0 mx-0' fluid>
                <FilterForm />
            </Container>
            <Container className='home-responsePagination py-3 px-0 mx-0' fluid>
                <ResponsePagination data={ data } />
            </Container>
        </>
    )
}

export default HomeScreen;
